tool_description:
TokenMetadat for every token on UniwapV2
-Price
-tradingVolumeUsd
-name
-symbol
etc...
title: Ethereum

api_list.name: Get BlockNumber
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum16.p.rapidapi.com/blockNumber"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum16.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get GasPrice
api_list.description:

api_list.name: Get TokenMetaData UniswapV3
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum16.p.rapidapi.com/getTokenPrice/v3/{address}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum16.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
